long_description: Extend the life of your MSR snowshoes with the Snowshoe Field Maintenance Kit, which consists of replacement parts for MSR snowshoes. Features 4 strap clips, 1 Axis pull tab and 1 Axis pin for making binding strap repairs. Includes 2 clevis pins, 2 split rings and 2 washers for easy hardware fixes. Kit is rounded out with 2 rivet screws, 2 rivet nuts and 3 nubs.
short_description: Extend the life of your MSR snowshoes with the Snowshoe Field Maintenance Kit, which consists of replacement parts for MSR snowshoes.
